channel.title: Need help Making a Server!
channel.description:
People, I need help making a server.
I have no clue what to do.
Do I buy some big computer box thing to use?
Do I download something?
It would really help if someone could tell me... And it would mean alot to take the time out that you need to help me. :)
Thanks! And have an awesome day![br][size=1]Posted on: April 29, 2007, 02:59:53 PM[/size][hr]It would mean alot if someone could tell me how to get started....
I would REALLY appreciate it.
